featured.text: They are heavily processed with more calories and sodium than meat and are more expensive too!

definition.zh_def: 鈉，一種化學元素，符號為Na，原子序數為11，是一種金屬元素，通常以鹽的形式存在。
definition.en_def: Sodium, a chemical element with the symbol Na and atomic number 11, is a metallic element commonly found in salt.
definition.example: Sodium is essential for maintaining fluid balance in the body.
